title: Pelosi Attack Highlights Rising Fears of Political Violence

media:description: Security personnel standing guard while Representative Steve Scalise, Republican of Louisiana, was speaking on the steps of the Capitol last year. Mr. Scalise was shot in 2017 by a man with a grudge against Republicans.
